mapper.select: select * from menu where menu_date between '2023-12-18' and '2023-12-22';
mapper.insert: insert into menu (menu_name, menu_corner, menu_price, menu_pack, menu_image, menu_sales, menu_regist, menu_date) values (#{menu_name}, #{menu_corner}, #{menu_price}, #{menu_pack}, #{menu_image}, 1, 1, DATE(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP));
